definitions.definition: ( chemistry ) A metallic salt derived from a fatty acid , commonly used in cleaning products.
( countable , uncountable , informal , by extension , mineralogy ) Some other substance, often a detergent or another surfactant , able to mix with both oil and water, used for cleaning.
examples: I tried washing my hands with soap , but the stain wouldn't go away.
She went to the shop to buy soap but   they have ran out.

definitions.definition: ( slang ) Money , specially when used as a bribe .
( countable ) A solid masonry unit or brick reduced in depth or height from standard dimensions.

main_definition: ( chemistry ) A metallic salt derived from a fatty acid , commonly used in cleaning products.
